body:
After talking with @relud earlier today, we decided to make lazy-loading the API request to the classify endpoint a feature experiment behind a pref, as sudden shifts in server load due to filter changes has implications for scaling servers that we'd like to test out first.

@gijsk You might want to take a look at the new commits. They have some testing utils that may already exist elsewhere in Firefox that I'm not aware of. FYI only the two last commits are new, the rest are old but rebased on master.
